description: Combine thin rice stick noodles, salad, chilli, coriander and fried shallots, then toss with a delicious Vietnamese dressing for a quick and easy salad.
name: Vietnamese Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt little gem lettuce, leaves separated

recipeInstructions.text: Using the julienne cutter, cut carrot into matchsticks. Place sugar and vinegar in a bowl. Stir until sugar has dissolved. Add carrot and stir to coat. Set aside.
Cook noodles according to packet instructions. Drain and refresh under cold water.

Using the mandoline slicer, slice cucumber into thin rounds. Drain carrot mixture. Arrange lettuce and noodles on 4 serving plates. Top with cucumber, carrot and coriander. Drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with chilli and fried shallots. Serve.
